TEXT.TITLE: SOUTH AFRICAN MINISTER SHOT, INJURED
TEXT.BODY: South Africa's Environmental Affairs Minister John Wiley has been injured in a shooting incident at his home, police said A police spokesman said the matter was still being investigated and refused to give further details. The South African Press Association said no crime was suspected. The minister's condition was not known. REUTER
